job_title: Lecturer in Saint Bonaventure, NY
pros: As an instructor, you have small / reasonable class sizes. This lets you really get to know the students. Full-time load is 4/4 with summers off (full professors get 3/3). Perhaps this is a con for some people. Depending on the department, overloads are possible for extra (small) pay. I like the culture; there have been good changes in the time I've been here. You really are quite free to pursue what you wish in terms of research and course content in the content areas. Benefits, once they kick in, are quite good. 10% _additional_ salary in retirement account and 4 health plans to choose from.
cons: There is a feeling of apathy in some of the long-time employees. I hear lots of stories, but haven't personally experienced much of what they claim. Pay raises aren't very much.
